meanings.def: used when you are commenting on what somebody has just said
examples: ‘We're off to France soon.’ ‘Oh yeah? When's that?’
‘I'm going to be rich one day.’ ‘Oh yeah?’ (= I don't believe you.)

meanings.def: used to say that you do not believe what somebody has just said, disagree with it, or are not interested in it

idioms.def: used when you are commenting on what somebody has just said
examples: ‘We're off to France soon.’ ‘Oh yeah? When's that?’
‘I'm going to be rich one day.’ ‘Oh yeah?’ (= I don't believe you.)

idioms.def: used to say that you do not believe what somebody has just said, disagree with it, or are not interested in it
